TextLibrary.Text: Arrive at the Emporium of Keck to locate a Starhound.
You've located the Starhound at the Emporium of Keck.
You've located the Starhound at the Emporium of Keck. A Starhound will cost at least 1000 Credits. Return when you have the money.
1000 Credits deducted. You now have the device to track ships.
